title: Miyaki District, Saga
text:
is a <a href="Districts%20of%20Japan">district</a> located in <a href="Saga%20Prefecture">Saga Prefecture</a>, <a href="Japan">Japan</a>.
In February 2009, the district had an estimated <a href="population">population</a> of 54,233 and a <a href="population%20density">density</a> of 625 per km2. The total area is 86.82 km2.
Municipalities.
History.
Miyaki District consists of three former districts of <a href="Hizen%20Province">Hizen Province</a>: Kii, Mine and Yabu Districts.
